jenes.stage.operator

Class Crowder<T extends Chromosome>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.stage.AbstractStage<T>
      • jenes.stage.operator.Operator<T>
        • jenes.stage.operator.Crowder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeJongCrowder, DeterministicCrowder, MultiNicheCrowder, SteadyState

    public abstract class Crowder<T extends Chromosome>
extends Operator<T>
    This class provides abstraction to crowders. A crowder perform preselection before its body processes the population, and controls the replacement after.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0

      • setElitist

        public void setElitist(boolean flag)
        Sets the crowder elistism. If true, offspings replace parents only if they are better.

        flag -

      • process

        public void process(Population<T> in,
           Population<T> out)
             throws StageException
        Performs crowding processing, according the the following scheme:
        1. pre = preselect(in)
        2. evo = body.process(pre)
        3. out = replace(evo)
        Specified by:
        process in class AbstractStage<T extends Chromosome>
        Parameters:
        in -
        out -
        Throws:
        StageException

      • preselect

        protected abstract void preselect(Population<T> in,
             Population<T> out)
        Preselection of individuals before processing.
        Parameters:
        in - input population
        out - output population

      • replace

        protected abstract void replace(Population<T> initial,
           Population<T> preselected,
           Population<T> evolved,
           Population<T> out)
        Implements the replacement policy.
        Parameters:
        initial - - the initial population
        preselected - - the population resulting from preselection
        evolved - - the part of population that has evolved
        out - - the output population

      • similarity

        public double similarity(double[] diff)
        Computes a degree of similarity given the genetic difference vector between two chromosomes. By default, similarity is computed as reprocical of eucledian distance between genes. Other definitions are possible by overriding this method in subclasses.
        Parameters:
        diff - - the difference vector
        Returns:
        similarity degree

public void setBiggerIsBetter(boolean flag,
                                boolean recursively)
        Deprecated. 
        Overrides:
        setBiggerIsBetter in class AbstractStage<T extends Chromosome>
        Parameters:
        flag - true, if the best individual has the higher fitness
        recursively - true, to propagate this setting down, otherwise false.
